sourcesContent:
import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import "../styles/Sidebar.css"; import { useAuth } from "../contexts/AuthContext"; function Sidebar() { const { authenticatedUser, logout } = useAuth(); const location = useLocation(); const capitalizeFirstLetter = (string) => { return string?.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + string?.toLowerCase().slice(1); }; return (
{authenticatedUser && ( <>
The Garage

Welcome
{capitalizeFirstLetter(authenticatedUser.username)}

  • Dashboard
  • Reports
  • Owners
  • Vehicles
  • Bills
)}
); } export default Sidebar;
